= }} '''Motala ström''' is the river system that drains lake [[Vättern]], the second largest lake in [[Sweden]], into the [[Baltic Sea]] in [[Norrköping]]. It is named from the city [[Motala]] where it begins. In the early 19th century, the [[Göta Canal]] was constructed in parallel with Motala ström. ==References== {{reflist}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Motala Strom}} [[Category:Rivers of Sweden]] [[Category:Götaland]] [[Category:Motala ström basin|*]] {{sweden-geo-stub}}
